name: Music Flower Poem
description:
As a way to get closer to my own essence, a conjunction between lyrics, words, chords and songs, this work is a mixture between my flower project and my soul as a singer. 

First of 3 audiovisual works in which the complete musical work is revealed. Audio recorded in 2019 and saved until today, exclusive to this platform.

And here I leave you a little poem:

to understand each other with the wind
it is only necessary to be the way
the wayfarer
and the moon that accompanies him.
